welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bastrop, where southern charm meets small town charm! Known for its stunning natural scenery and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Giddings-Lee County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Giddings-Lee County Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport is primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Austin Executive Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
